definitions.definition: Made to conform to some style .
Represented according to some convention , omitting dispensable detail, rather than in a realistic or literal manner.
examples: The symbol for the planet Mars is a stylized representation of the shield and spear of the god Mars.

main_definition: Made to conform to some style .
secondary_definitions: Represented according to some convention , omitting dispensable detail, rather than in a realistic or literal manner.
